text:
NAME : MAANVI SHADAKSHARI
ROLL NO : 1023247
COMP B / B2
PRACTICAL NO 0. 3
# This script is created by NSG2 beta1
# <http://wushoupong.googlepages.com/nsg>
#===================================
# Simulation parameters setup
#===================================
set val(stop) 10.0 ;# time of simulation end
#===================================
# Initialization
#===================================
#Create a ns simulator
set ns [new Simulator]
#Open the NS trace file
set tracefile [open out.tr w]
$ns trace-all $tracefile
#Open the NAM trace file
set namfile [open out.nam w]
$ns namtrace-all $namfile
#===================================
# Nodes Definition
#===================================
#Create 17 nodes
set n4 [$ns node]
set n5 [$ns node]
set n8 [$ns node]
set n9 [$ns node]
set n10 [$ns node]
set n11 [$ns node]
set n12 [$ns node]
set n13 [$ns node]
set n19 [$ns node]
set n20 [$ns node]
set n21 [$ns node]
set n22 [$ns node]
set n23 [$ns node]
set n24 [$ns node]
set n25 [$ns node]
set n26 [$ns node]
set n27 [$ns node]
#===================================
# Links Definition
#===================================
#Createlinks between nodes
$ns duplex-link $n4 $n5 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n4 $n5 50
$ns duplex-link $n5 $n12 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n5 $n12 50
$ns duplex-link $n12 $n13 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n12 $n13 50
$ns duplex-link $n13 $n8 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n13 $n8 50
$ns duplex-link $n8 $n9 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n8 $n9 50
$ns duplex-link $n9 $n10 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n9 $n10 50
$ns duplex-link $n10 $n11 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n10 $n11 50
$ns duplex-link $n11 $n4 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n11 $n4 50
$ns duplex-link $n20 $n19 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n20 $n19 50
$ns duplex-link $n19 $n22 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n19 $n22 50
$ns duplex-link $n22 $n21 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n22 $n21 50
$ns duplex-link $n21 $n20 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n21 $n20 50
$ns duplex-link $n20 $n23 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n20 $n23 50
$ns duplex-link $n23 $n22 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n23 $n22 50
$ns duplex-link $n19 $n23 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n19 $n23 50
$ns duplex-link $n23 $n21 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n23 $n21 50
$ns duplex-link $n24 $n25 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n24 $n25 50
$ns duplex-link $n25 $n26 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n25 $n26 50
$ns duplex-link $n26 $n27 100.0Mb 10ms DropTail
$ns queue-limit $n26 $n27 50
#Give node position (for NAM)
$ns duplex-link-op $n4 $n5 orient right-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n5 $n12 orient right-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n12 $n13 orient left-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n13 $n8 orient left-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n8 $n9 orient left-up
$ns duplex-link-op $n9 $n10 orient left-up
$ns duplex-link-op $n10 $n11 orient right-up
$ns duplex-link-op $n11 $n4 orient right-up
$ns duplex-link-op $n20 $n19 orient left
$ns duplex-link-op $n19 $n22 orient right-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n22 $n21 orient right
$ns duplex-link-op $n21 $n20 orient right-up
$ns duplex-link-op $n20 $n23 orient left-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n23 $n22 orient left-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n19 $n23 orient right-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n23 $n21 orient right-down
$ns duplex-link-op $n24 $n25 orient right
$ns duplex-link-op $n25 $n26 orient right
$ns duplex-link-op $n26 $n27 orient right
#===================================
# Agents Definition
#===================================
#===================================
# Applications Definition
#===================================
#===================================
# Termination
#===================================
#Define a 'finish' procedure
proc finish {} {
global ns tracefile namfile
$ns flush-trace
close $tracefile
close $namfile
exec nam out.nam &
exit 0
}
$ns at $val(stop) "$ns nam-end-wireless $val(stop)"
$ns at $val(stop) "finish"
$ns at $val(stop) "puts \"done\" ; $ns halt"
$ns run
